desc: The funky and bright design of these socks makes them a must-have for your sock drawer. In this 3 pair pack you receive 1 pair of each striped pattern style. This includes a pair of thinly striped / bold thicker striped and a pair of black socks with 6 stripes at the top. All styles have a black heel toe and top. You will receive the socks in a rainbow styled flat pack packaging, a great way to present the socks if you are buying them as a gift.

Our rainbow socks are made of a cotton-rich blend using 82% Cotton to create a super soft pair of socks which will keep feet comfortable throughout use. This high cotton content also means that the socks are suitable for summer use – being breathable and cool as well as being super comfortable. They look great for casual wear, such as wearing them with jeans. These funky rainbow dress socks would even jazz up a dull work suit outfit. You can wear these socks for almost any occasion you want to dress for.
